name: NSStringDrawingOptions
desc: Constants that specify the rendering options for drawing a string.

items.name: static var usesLineFragmentOrigin: NSStringDrawingOptions
items.desc: Uses the line fragment origin instead of the baseline origin.

items.name: static var usesFontLeading: NSStringDrawingOptions
items.desc: Uses the font leading for calculating line heights.

items.name: static var usesDeviceMetrics: NSStringDrawingOptions
items.desc: Uses image glyph bounds instead of typographic bounds.

items.name: static var truncatesLastVisibleLine: NSStringDrawingOptions
items.desc: Truncates and adds the ellipsis character to the last visible line if the text doesn't fit into the specified bounds.
